title: VooDoo & Serano
text:
VooDoo & Serano are a duo of DJs and producers/remixers from Germany. They are made up of DJ VooDoo (aka Reinhard Raith) and Tommy Serano.


== Discography ==


=== Albums ===
Cold Blood (2002)
Back for More (2004)
